title: Why am I always paired with retards?
body: Every game its the same, theres always one or 2 players who have absolutely 0 idea how to play league and or there champ. They then end up feeding and most likely flaming........every game. Picture above is one of the many games where i have been put with a legit mentally retarded team -_-.

replies.body: It would pay to keep in mind that these players are picked from the **exact same pool** as you.
Not sure about the same pool.
You can deny it all you want, that doesn't make it any less true.
I don't need to deny it since i know its not true :)

If you are matched with/against a team it is because their MMR is similar to yours. So yes, they were selected from the same pool of players as you, that is precisely how matchmaking works. 

You will get teams on the better end of the spectrum and the worse, but ultimately they share your average MMR and thus the good and the bad will balance out. If you belong at a higher rank you will climb as the odds swing in your favour (your MMR + skill above your MMR = more wins) and if you belong where you are you will stay where you are until you improve. Such is the purpose of MMR and matchmaking.

See the thing is, you can't do anything about Corzey's gameplay or jodflap's for that matter. There is NOTHING you can do, you will probably never ever see them or play with them again. So there is literally no point at all in blaming your team mates for your losses, sure it may be their fault sometimes but you can't improve them as players. What you CAN do is improve your OWN gameplay, and that's about all you can do. Dwelling on your Solo Queue team mates' incompetence is futile.
